title: Human Resources
summary: Building a motivated, well-supported and recognised IAESTE family.
description: The Human Resources Department plans and executes various activities including workshops, programs, networking events, and social gatherings to foster community engagement.

title: Information Technology & Data Analytics (IT-DA)
summary: Powering IAESTE's digital infrastructure and data-driven decisions.
description: The ID-DA Department manages the organization's digital presence, maintains the website, handles IT infrastructure, and develops tools to streamline operations and member services.

title: Incoming Exchange
summary: Welcoming international interns and curating their complete experience.
description: The Incoming Department coordinates with international students, handles their accommodation, organizes cultural activities, and ensures a smooth experience during their stay in India.

title: Outgoing Exchange
summary: Guiding JECRC students to international internships worldwide.
description: The Outgoing Department assists students in discovering global internship opportunities, managing applications, and providing support throughout the entire process from application to placement.

title: Administration
summary: Keeping offers, records and processes accurate, compliant and on-time.
description: The Adminstration Department provides crucial support for applications, passport processing, and all necessary paperwork required for international travel and internships.

title: Public Relations
summary: Telling IAESTE's story through campaigns, content and design.
description: The Public Relations Department is responsible for creating awareness about IAESTE programs, managing social media presence, organizing promotional events, and building the brand identity of the local committee.

title: Corporate Relations & Alumni (CRA)
summary: Building bridges between students, alumni and the corporate world.
description: The Corporate Relations & Alumni Department maintains relationships with corporate partners, educational institutions, sponsors, and alumni to support the organization's mission and growth.
